summary: I WAS DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY AND SUDDENLY MY SPEED GAUGE STOPED WORKING. SO I PULLED OFF THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND SHUT IT OFF. TURNED IT BACK ON AND PUT IT BACK INTO DRIVE IT JERKED HARD AND WOULDN'T MOVE UNTIL I FLOORED IT THEN IT MOVED SLOWLY THIS HAS HAPPENED MORE THAN ONCE SEEMS DANGEROUS
